name: AMERICAN UNITY FUND, INC.
description: Non-Profit Advocating Freedom for Gay and Lesbian Americans
sampleDescriptions: Freedom for LGBT Americans, Including Nondiscrimination and Federal Recognition of Lawfully Married Same-Sex Couples; Specific Bills Include: Juror Nondiscrimination Act, H.R. 1515; Jury Access Act, S. 635; Fair and Equal Housing Act, H.R. 1447; Safe Schools Improvement Act, H.R. 1957; Every Child Deserves a Family Act, H.R. 2640; Child Welfare Provider Inclusion Act, H.R. 1881/S. 811; First Amendment Defense Act, S. 2525; Providing for the retention and service of transgender members of the Armed Forces, S. 1820.

Freedom for LGBTQ Americans, Including Nondiscrimination; Specific Bills Include: Equality Act, H.R. 5/S. 788; A resolution expressing opposition to banning service in the Armed Forces by openly transgender individuals, H. Res. 124; A bill to provide for the retention and service of transgender individuals in the Armed Forces, H.R. 1032/S. 373.
